question:
[Faye] and her son [Thomas] went out to lunch together yesterday. [Thomas] took his sister, [Cecil], to a baseball game. [Charles]'s nephew [Christopher] was happy to hear that he will be arriving at the airport later tonight. [Faye] and [Gregory] have been married for 35 years. [Christine] and her brother [Christopher] went to see a movie. [Christine] took her sister, [Cecil], out to dinner for her birthday. [Brad] invited his father [Charles] and his brother [Anthony] to go on a weekend fishing trip.
Question: How is [Anthony] related to [Gregory]?
